# u-progress

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property         | Attribute         | Description                                                                   | Type      | Default     |
| ---------------- | ----------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `borderless`     | `borderless`      | Remove border.                                                                | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `height`         | `height`          | Size of height of the bar, standard set to 1.25rem. Possible to use any unit. | `string`  | `'1.25rem'` |
| `max`            | `max`             | Maximum of values                                                             | `number`  | `100`       |
| `showPercentage` | `show-percentage` | Enables text, which shows the percentage.                                     | `boolean` | `true`      |
| `value`          | `value`           | Value used to calculate progress                                              | `number`  | `100`       |
